Posts.Title: Advice please! Cannot decide between LD flap and implant or expanders...

Posts.Content: Hi there, I saw the plastic surgeon last week about recon. She seemed very keen on a LD (back) flap with a small implant behind. I was all for it until I read a few horror stories on here, and discovered it's a 6-7 hour operation. She said expanders and implants alone often cause problems with capsulation and don't look as natural. Now I'm in a complete quandary and need to decide relatively soon. Would any of you who have had either procedure please let me know your thoughts and experiences?  Many, many thanks in advance. Coco x

Posts.Content: Hi,  Hi. I read your post with interest. I think I have a similar situation as regards diagnosis at least. ER+ 8/8 Grade 2 IDC tumour with an additional large area (5.5+cm) of DCIS. No lymph nodes involved. Ended up with a mastectomy. Consultant at follow up this week said in his opinion no chemo was needed. I asked to have the Oncotype test which he agreed to reluctantly. He said that that if I get a high result "You'll think you'll need chemo, and I don't think it'll make a difference, it's just a statistical 'best' guess" This seems an unusual attitude. I'd be very interested to follow what informs your end decision and what your Oncologist says. I'm sorry if this is unhelpful to you. I suspect I may have the same dilemma in a couple of weeks so hope you feel my support for you!  Thanks for posting and all the best. Xx
